3PTSCAL_KRG.long description: Enable multi-point scaling for saturation endpoints of rock-fluid curves.

3PTSCAL_KROG.long description: Enable multi-point scaling for saturation endpoints of rock-fluid curves.

3PTSCAL_KROW.long description: Enable multi-point scaling for saturation endpoints of rock-fluid curves.

3PTSCAL_KRW.long description: Enable multi-point scaling for saturation endpoints of rock-fluid curves.

3PTSCAL_PCOG.long description: Enable multi-point scaling for saturation endpoints of rock-fluid curves.

3PTSCAL_PCOW.long description: Enable multi-point scaling for saturation endpoints of rock-fluid curves.

3PTSCALING.long description: Enable multi-point scaling for saturation endpoints of rock-fluid curves.

ACEN.long description: Assign component critical pressure, critical temperature and acentric factor.

ACT-DEFAULT.long description: Set global default remedial action on violation of well operating constraints.

ACTIVATE.long description: Open or close a previously defined Flexible Wellbore.

ACTIVATION-ENERGY.long description: Input parameters to build the solid species reaction stoichiometry matrix. Input the logarithms of the solubility product constants for each reaction. Input the enthalpy change for temperature dependent precipitation/dissolution reactions (optional). Input rate parameters for transitional state theory and equilibrium trapping solid kinetics. Input solid precipitation/dissolution reaction enthalpy.

AD_MIN.long description: Assign pH dependency parameters to the component adsorption.

AD_PHC.long description: Assign pH dependency parameters to the component adsorption.

AD_PHP.long description: Assign pH dependency parameters to the component adsorption.

ADHEAT.long description: Assign data for controlling adiabatic heat gain.

ADMAXT.long description: Assign rock (permeability) dependence of adsorption data for component/phase indicated via *ADSCOMP.

ADRT.long description: Assign rock (permeability) dependence of adsorption data for component/phase indicated via *ADSCOMP.

ADSCOMP.long description: Assign composition and temperature dependence of component adsorption.

ADSCOMP2.long description: Assign composition and temperature dependence of component adsorption.

ADSLANG.long description: Assign composition and temperature dependence of component adsorption.

ADSPHBLK.long description: Assign rock (permeability) dependence of adsorption data for component/phase indicated via *ADSCOMP.

ADSRATE.long description: Assign rock (permeability) dependence of adsorption data for component/phase indicated via *ADSCOMP.

ADSROCK.long description: Assign rock (permeability) dependence of adsorption data for component/phase indicated via *ADSCOMP.

ADSTABLE.long description: Assign composition and temperature dependence of component adsorption.

ADSTYPE.long description: Assign rock (permeability) dependence of adsorption data for component/phase indicated via *ADSCOMP.

AI_ALIGN.long description: Enable or disable storage alignment for the adaptive implicit option.

AIM.long description: Specify the Adaptive Implicit Method (AIM) option.

ALFDR.description: Compaction-Rebounding With Variable cp and cT (Optional)
ALFDR.long description: Define a pore volume compaction-rebounding model via the pressure history dependent pore compressibility and thermal expansion coefficient.

ALITHO.long description: Specify properties for each electrical heating set.

ALL.description: Values that Vary for Most or All Grid Blocks
ALL.long description: *ALL is used to indicate that values vary in most or all the grid blocks. The number of values expected is the number of grid blocks in the grid, including all null or zero-porosity blocks.

ALLELEM.description: Assigning Grid Properties to All Elements
ALLELEM.long description: Assign data to all elements of grid blocks.

ALTER.description: Alter Primary Well Operating Constraint Value (Optional)
ALTER.long description: *ALTER allows modification of only the primary operating constraint value specified wells. The primary operating constraint is the FIRST constraint entered for the well using the *OPERATE keyword.

ALTER-HIST.description: Alter Observed Flow Rates for History-Matching (Optional)
ALTER-HIST.long description: *ALTER-HIST allows modification of the observed flow rates for wells running in the special history-matching mode.

AMAT_AQ.long description: Input the coefficients for the aqueous species abundance matrix. *AMAT_AQ AQ1,1  AQ1,2 . . . AQ1,aq AQ2,1  AQ2,2 . . . AQ1,aq . . . AQn,1  AQn,2 . . . AQn,aq

AMAT_SLD.long description: Input the coefficients for the solid species abundance matrix

AMAT_SRB.long description: Input the coefficients for the sorbed species abundance matrix

AMG-COARSEN.long description: *AMG-COARSEN selects the aggressiveness of the coarsening process used during the AMG setup phase for solver *PARASOL under *COMBINATIVE mode.

AMG-EPS.long description: *AMG-EPS is the residual threshold stopping criterion used by AMG.

AMG-ITERMAX.long description: *AMG-ITERMAX specifies the maximum number of AMG cycles to be performed per solver iteration.

AMG-KRYLOV.long description: *AMG-KRYLOV specifies the accelerator (Krylov method) of multiple AMG cycles.

AMG-SETUP-FREQ.long description: *AMG-SETUP-FREQ selects the frequency of a full setup of AMG for solver *PARASOL under *COMBINATIVE mode.

AMG-SMOOTHER.long description: *AMG-SMOOTHER defines the number and type of smoothing sweeps used for AMG.

APPOR-METHOD.description: Apportionment Method for Meeting Group Targets (Optional)
APPOR-METHOD.long description: Specify the apportionment method that distributes the production or injection rates among contributing wells or groups to meet group targets defined by *GCONP or *GCONI.

AQCOMP.long description: Define aquifer model for reservoir boundary water influx and heat transfer calculations.

AQEN_CONTROL.long description: Specify a correction factor in the calculation of heat influx of analytical or semi-analytical aquifer to avoid unphysical temperature changes at adjacent reservoir blocks.

AQFLUX.description: Aquifer Boundary Flux or Aquifer Boundary Pressure (Conditional)
AQFLUX.long description: Define aquifer boundary flux or aquifer boundary pressure vs. time in table form.

AQFRCOMP.long description: Specify reference conditions for fluid properties and surface conditions.

AQFUNC.long description: *AQFUNC indicates input of a dimensionless pressure influence function as a table.

AQFUNC-EXT.long description: Specify the dimensionless time at which the analytical extrapolation starts for the internal pressure influence function.

AQGEOM.long description: Define aquifer model for reservoir boundary water influx and heat transfer calculations.

AQLEAK.long description: Define aquifer model for reservoir boundary water influx and heat transfer calculations.

AQMETHOD.long description: Define aquifer model for reservoir boundary water influx and heat transfer calculations.

AQPINIT.long description: Define aquifer model for reservoir boundary water influx and heat transfer calculations.

AQPRES.description: Aquifer Boundary Flux or Aquifer Boundary Pressure (Conditional)
AQPRES.long description: Define aquifer boundary flux or aquifer boundary pressure vs. time in table form.

AQPROP.long description: Define aquifer model for reservoir boundary water influx and heat transfer calculations.

AQPROP-FET.long description: Define aquifer model for reservoir boundary water influx and heat transfer calculations.

AQSTAT.long description: *OUTPRN identifies what information is written to the output print file at a frequency given by *WPRN. *PARTCLSIZE provides the properties required to print out in some optional units.

AQUIFER.long description: Define aquifer model for reservoir boundary water influx and heat transfer calculations.

AQVISC.long description: Define aquifer model for reservoir boundary water influx and heat transfer calculations.

AREALPINCH-TOL.long description: *AREALPINCH-TOL controls the minimal block size in I and J directions required to initiate an automatic areal pinched-out connection.

ASATUR.long description: Specify properties for each electrical heating set.

ATORTU.long description: Specify properties for each electrical heating set.

AUTOCOOLER.description: Constant and Convective Heat Transfer Model
AUTOCOOLER.long description: Assign data for constant and convective heat transfer models.

AUTODRILL.long description: *SHUTIN shuts in a well unconditionally. *OPEN opens a previously shut-in well. *AUTODRILL specifies that an undrilled (shut-in) well will be drilled (opened) automatically to meet the group-based target rates.

AUTOHEATER.description: Constant and Convective Heat Transfer Model
AUTOHEATER.long description: Assign data for constant and convective heat transfer models.

AUTOTUNE.long description: Activates and adjusts various numerical controls, including adaptive strategies for timestep size selection and material balance monitoring, to improve the numerical performance.

AVG.long description: Override the internal gas phase viscosity with a composition-dependent, and possibly pressure-dependent, calculation.

BBTENSH.long description: Compute fracture permeability or change fracture threshold of the Barton-Bandis model when fracturing occurs due to shear stress.

BCDOMAIN.long description: Specify pressure boundary between geomechanics and non-geomechanics grid domains.

BCOEF.long description: Define coefficients for a hyperelastic constitutive model #2 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

BEGIN_DFN.long description: *BEGIN_DFN allows the input of discrete fracture network data to be modelled explicitly in reservoir simulation.

BETA_VS.long description: Specify salinity component affecting the viscosity of the nonlinear mixing component and the effective parameters.

BG.long description: *BG assigns values or tasks to a group of blocks.

BHPDEFAULT.long description: Assign default bottom-hole pressure constraint values for wells.

BHPDEPTH.description: User-Specified Reference Depth for Well BHP (Optional)
BHPDEPTH.long description: Specify a well’s reference depth (location of bottom hole pressure) that is different from the depth of the well’s reference layer. See also *BHPGRAD.

BHPGRAD.description: User-Specified Pressure Gradient For Reference Depth for Well BHP (Optional)
BHPGRAD.long description: Specify a pressure gradient to compute the pressure difference between a well’s reference completion and its reference depth. See also *BHPDEPTH.

BINARY_DATA.long description: Keyword to indicate that grid-array data is stored in binary or simulation input (SIP) compressed form.

BIOTSCOEF.long description: Define strength properties of the formation.

BIOTSCOEFI.long description: Define mechanical properties of an anisotropic rock.

BIOTSCOEFJ.long description: Define mechanical properties of an anisotropic rock.

BIOTSCOEFK.long description: Define mechanical properties of an anisotropic rock.

BKRGCW.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BKRGIE.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BKROCW.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BKROGIE.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BKROWIE.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BKRWIE.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BKRWIRO.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BKRWRO.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BLOCKAGE.long description: Specify nonequilibrium blockage by captured solid (non-fluid) components.

BLOCKDFL.long description: Specify the location and usage of each node of a corner point grid.

BLOCKS.long description: Specify the location and usage of each node of a corner point grid.

BPCGMAX.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BPCWMAX.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSGCON.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSGR.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSIZE.long description: Specify the method for calculation of corner-point grid block size.

BSLCON.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSOIRG.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSOIRW.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSORG.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSORW.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSWCON.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSWCRIT.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSWIRG.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSWR.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BSWRG.long description: Specify end points of rock-fluid tables for each grid block.

BVG.long description: Override the internal gas phase viscosity with a composition-dependent, and possibly pressure-dependent, calculation.

CALIB_POR.long description: Improve accuracy of porosity coupling option *GCOUPLING 2.

CASEID.long description: Identify the project and individual run cases with titles and comments.

CHARGE-AQ.long description: Specify the name and charge of the aqueous species participating in the chemical reactions.

CHARGE-SRB.long description: Specify charge and names of sorbed species participating in the chemical reactions. Indicate the valence number difference for each species pair participating in exchange reactions with the reservoir clay. Input the ion-exchange capacity for the rock clays.

CHECKONLY.long description: Enable scan mode for checking of entire data.

CHECKRB.long description: Choose when to abandon using Red-Black Ordering for a PARASOL class (a class is defined as a disjoint set of blocks).

CKNJ.long description: A mass of jointed rock is treated as anisotropy, as opposed to the isotropy of an intact rock.

CKSJ.long description: A mass of jointed rock is treated as anisotropy, as opposed to the isotropy of an intact rock.

CKSPACING.long description: A mass of jointed rock is treated as anisotropy, as opposed to the isotropy of an intact rock.

CLUMPSETTING.long description: Assign a control setting or flow restriction parameter to the named control lumps. The flow restriction parameter is used as a multiplication factor in adjusting the value of the well index for all the layers belonging to a given control lump.

CMPNAME-AQ.long description: Specify the name and charge of the aqueous species participating in the chemical reactions.

CMPNAM-SLD.long description: Specifies the name of the solid species participating in the chemical reactions.

CMPNAM-SRB.long description: Specify charge and names of sorbed species participating in the chemical reactions. Indicate the valence number difference for each species pair participating in exchange reactions with the reservoir clay. Input the ion-exchange capacity for the rock clays.

COHESEXPNT.long description: Use the Generalized Plasticty constitutive model which allows cohesion, friction angle and dilation angle to change with effective plastic strain.

COHESHARD.long description: Use the Generalized Plasticty constitutive model which allows cohesion, friction angle and dilation angle to change with effective plastic strain.

COHESION.long description: Define strength properties of the formation.

COHESIONMAP.long description: Specify properties for each grid cell separately, when the degree of non-uniformity would cause the number of rock types to be inconvenient.

COMB-DRS.long description: *COMB-DRS selects the dynamic row-sum preconditioner for the solver *PARASOL in *COMBINATIVE mode.

COMBINATIVE.long description: *COMBINATIVE selects combinative 2-stage preconditioning for parallel solver *PARASOL. (In order to use this option, a special licensing feature must be active).

COMMENT.long description: *COMMENT changes the two character sequence that denotes the beginning of a comment.

COMPACT_VAR.description: Compaction-Rebounding With Variable cp and cT (Optional)
COMPACT_VAR.long description: Define a pore volume compaction-rebounding model via the pressure history dependent pore compressibility and thermal expansion coefficient.

COMP-GEO.long description: Initiate geochemistry option for simulating aqueous reactions. Specify the number of elemental components and total number of fluid and solid species participating in the aqueous reactions. Indicate if precipitation and ion exchange is present and the total number of sorbed species. Also, indicate the geo-elements and their location in the STARS component list. Enter the reference temperature for geochemical reactions.

COMPNAME.long description: Indicate number and name of each type of component in preparation for fluid data input.

CON.long description: *CON indicates that a constant value is entered for all array elements. The value may be entered on the same line or the next line.

CONVERT-TO-CORNER-POINT.description: Convert Cartesian Grid to Corner Point (Optional)
CONVERT-TO-CORNER-POINT.long description: Internally convert a Cartesian grid type to corner point type.

COORD.description: Line-Based Corner Point Locations for Corner Point Grids (Conditional)
COORD.long description: *COORD signals input of an array of "x"- and "y"- coordinate corner point location information for corner point grids.

CORNERS.description: Complete Corner Point Locations for Corner Point Grids (Conditional)
CORNERS.long description: *CORNERS signals input of a complete array of corner point locations for corner point grids.

CORNER-TOL.long description: *CORNER-TOL controls the minimal spacing required to separate corner points. *CORNER-TOL  cptol *PARTOL-TOL  partol

CP_IMBIB.long description: Indicate interpolation set number along with the values of interpolating parameter.

CPEPAC.long description: Define a reservoir pore volume dilation-recompaction model.

CPERMCOR.description: Compaction-Rebounding With Variable cp and cT (Optional)
CPERMCOR.long description: Define a pore volume compaction-rebounding model via the pressure history dependent pore compressibility and thermal expansion coefficient.

CPG1.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

CPG2.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

CPG3.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

CPG4.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

CPL1.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

CPL2.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

CPL3.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

CPL4.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

CPOR.long description: *PRPOR signals the input of a reference pressure for the formation compressibility. *CPOR signals the input of formation compressibility. *CTPOR signals the input of formation thermal expansion. *CPORPD signals the input of pressure-dependent formation compressibility. *PORINTERP specifies the interpretation of input porosity. *PORFORM specifies the form of p and T variation of porosity. *VOLCONST specifies the volume constraint type.

CPORPD.long description: *PRPOR signals the input of a reference pressure for the formation compressibility. *CPOR signals the input of formation compressibility. *CTPOR signals the input of formation thermal expansion. *CPORPD signals the input of pressure-dependent formation compressibility. *PORINTERP specifies the interpretation of input porosity. *PORFORM specifies the form of p and T variation of porosity. *VOLCONST specifies the volume constraint type.

CPTPOR.long description: *PRPOR signals the input of a reference pressure for the formation compressibility. *CPOR signals the input of formation compressibility. *CTPOR signals the input of formation thermal expansion. *CPORPD signals the input of pressure-dependent formation compressibility. *PORINTERP specifies the interpretation of input porosity. *PORFORM specifies the form of p and T variation of porosity. *VOLCONST specifies the volume constraint type.

CRAKSET.long description: A mass of jointed rock is treated as anisotropy, as opposed to the isotropy of an intact rock.

CRAKTYPE.long description: A mass of jointed rock is treated as anisotropy, as opposed to the isotropy of an intact rock.

CRB.description: Compaction-Rebounding With Variable cp and cT (Optional)
CRB.long description: Define a pore volume compaction-rebounding model via the pressure history dependent pore compressibility and thermal expansion coefficient.

CRD.long description: Define a reservoir pore volume dilation-recompaction model.

CRM.description: Compaction-Rebounding With Variable cp and cT (Optional)
CRM.long description: Define a pore volume compaction-rebounding model via the pressure history dependent pore compressibility and thermal expansion coefficient.

CRNCON_24N.description: Use 24N Representation for Corner Point Grid (Conditional)
CRNCON_24N.long description: *CRNCON_24N signals a request for treating corner point grid into a 24N system internally instead of the default node-based representation.

CRP.long description: Define a reservoir compaction-rebounding model with elastic-plastic deformations via constant compressibility and thermal expansion coefficient.

CTD.long description: Define a reservoir pore volume dilation-recompaction model.

CTP.long description: Define a reservoir compaction-rebounding model with elastic-plastic deformations via constant compressibility and thermal expansion coefficient.

CTPOR.long description: *PRPOR signals the input of a reference pressure for the formation compressibility. *CPOR signals the input of formation compressibility. *CTPOR signals the input of formation thermal expansion. *CPORPD signals the input of pressure-dependent formation compressibility. *PORINTERP specifies the interpretation of input porosity. *PORFORM specifies the form of p and T variation of porosity. *VOLCONST specifies the volume constraint type.

CTPPAC.long description: Define a reservoir pore volume dilation-recompaction model.

CVFANGLE.long description: Use the Generalized Plasticty constitutive model which allows cohesion, friction angle and dilation angle to change with effective plastic strain.

CYC_GROUP.long description: Specify well groups for Cyclic Steam operation.

CYCPRT_END.description: Select Cycling Group Cycle Part to Start and End Cycling Group Control (Optional)
CYCPRT_END.long description: Select the cycle starting part and the cycle ending part.

CYCPRT_START.description: Select Cycling Group Cycle Part to Start and End Cycling Group Control (Optional)
CYCPRT_START.long description: Select the cycle starting part and the cycle ending part.

DATE.long description: Control start, stop, well change and printout times.

DATUMDEPTH.long description: Specify datum depth for output of pressure corrected to a datum.

DEACTIVATE.long description: Open or close a previously defined Flexible Wellbore.

DELH-KEQ.long description: Input parameters to build the aqueous species reaction stoichiometry matrix. Input the logarithms of the equilibrium constants for each reaction. Input the enthalpy change for temperature dependent reactions (optional).

DELH-KEX.long description: Input parameters to build the sorbed species reaction stoichiometry matrix. Input the logarithms of the exchange equilibrium constants for each reaction. Input the enthalpy change for temperature dependent exchange equilibrium reactions (optional).

DELH-KSP.long description: Input parameters to build the solid species reaction stoichiometry matrix. Input the logarithms of the solubility product constants for each reaction. Input the enthalpy change for temperature dependent precipitation/dissolution reactions (optional). Input rate parameters for transitional state theory and equilibrium trapping solid kinetics. Input solid precipitation/dissolution reaction enthalpy.

DEPTH.long description: *DEPTH indicates input of a reservoir depth for a single grid block.

DEPTH-TOP.long description: *DEPTH-TOP indicates input of depths to the top of each grid block in the reservoir.

DFRICANGLE.long description: Define coefficients for a hyperelastic constitutive model #2 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

DFSCUTOFF.description: Pore Volume Cut-Off Threshold for DFSEG (Optional)
DFSCUTOFF.long description: *DFSCUTOFF controls the level at which a discrete fracture segment (DFSEG)’s pore volume is small enough to be considered zero.

DGOC.long description: Specify initial saturations in reservoir, or override vertical equilibrium saturations.

DI.long description: *DI assigns grid block sizes in the I direction. For radial grid type, this is in the radial direction.

DIFFI_GAS.long description: Enter effective molecular diffusion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DIFFI_OIL.long description: Enter effective molecular diffusion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DIFFI_WAT.long description: Enter effective molecular diffusion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DIFFJ_GAS.long description: Enter effective molecular diffusion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DIFFJ_OIL.long description: Enter effective molecular diffusion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DIFFJ_WAT.long description: Enter effective molecular diffusion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DIFFK_GAS.long description: Enter effective molecular diffusion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DIFFK_OIL.long description: Enter effective molecular diffusion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DIFFK_WAT.long description: Enter effective molecular diffusion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DIFRAC.long description: *DIFRAC indicates the input of fracture spacing in the I direction. *DJFRAC indicates the input of fracture spacing in the J direction. *DKFRAC indicates the input of fracture spacing in the K direction.

DILANGLE.long description: Define strength properties of the formation.

DILATION.long description: Define a reservoir pore volume dilation-recompaction model.

DILFACTOR.long description: A mass of jointed rock is treated as anisotropy, as opposed to the isotropy of an intact rock.

DIM.long description: Over-ride default dimension estimates based on the preliminary data scan.

DIM_DEPTH_TABLE.long description: *DIM_DEPTH_TABLE specifies how many points to use when creating a property vs. depth table during *VERTICAL *DEPTH_AVE initialization. In depth average (*VERTICAL *DEPTH_AVE) initialization, the Depth table is generated to provide the profiles of pressure, phase densities and capillary pressures, etc. versus depth. FORMAT: *DIM_DEPTH_TABLE *MIN_DSIZE  step_size | *MD_SEG  step_number

DIP.long description: *DIP specifies the input of dip angles.

DISPI_GAS.long description: Enter total dispersion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DISPI_OIL.long description: Enter total dispersion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DISPI_WAT.long description: Enter total dispersion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DISPJ_GAS.long description: Enter total dispersion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DISPJ_OIL.long description: Enter total dispersion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DISPJ_WAT.long description: Enter total dispersion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DISPK_GAS.long description: Enter total dispersion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DISPK_OIL.long description: Enter total dispersion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DISPK_WAT.long description: Enter total dispersion coefficients for the desired component and phase.

DISPLACTOL.long description: Override default control parameters for plastic deformation option.

DISTORTED-BLOCK.long description: *DISTORTED-BLOCK specifies the action when block geometry is invalid.

DJ.long description: *DJ assigns grid block sizes in the J direction. For radial grid type this is in the angular direction.

DJFRAC.long description: *DIFRAC indicates the input of fracture spacing in the I direction. *DJFRAC indicates the input of fracture spacing in the J direction. *DKFRAC indicates the input of fracture spacing in the K direction.

DK.long description: *DK assigns grid block sizes in the K direction. For radial grid type this is in the axial direction.

DKFRAC.long description: *DIFRAC indicates the input of fracture spacing in the I direction. *DJFRAC indicates the input of fracture spacing in the J direction. *DKFRAC indicates the input of fracture spacing in the K direction.

DLOADBC.long description: Specify distributed loads along an edge of a finite element.

DLOADBC2D.long description: Specify distributed loads along an edge of a finite element.

DLOADBC3D.long description: Specify distributed load on a surface of a 3D finite element.

DLOADIJK.long description: Specify distributed load on a surface of a 3D finite element.

DNMIXCOMP.long description: Specify nonlinear mixing rule for liquid density.

DNMIXENDP.long description: Specify nonlinear mixing rule for liquid density.

DNMIXFUNC.long description: Specify nonlinear mixing rule for liquid density.

DPLANES.long description: Specify target number of planes per domain for parallel Jacobian building.

DRCTABLE.long description: Stress-dependent dilation-recompaction table lookup is used to determine permeability multipliers or transmissibility multipliers.

DRILLMXW.description: Priority List for Automatic Drilling of Wells (Optional)
DRILLMXW.long description: *DRILLQ selects the algorithm for automatic opening of wells or the specification of the order of automatic drilling of wells. *DRILLT specifies a time delay between successive well drilling operations. *DRILLMXW specifies the maximum number of wells drilled simultaneously.

DRILLQ.description: Priority List for Automatic Drilling of Wells (Optional)
DRILLQ.long description: *DRILLQ selects the algorithm for automatic opening of wells or the specification of the order of automatic drilling of wells. *DRILLT specifies a time delay between successive well drilling operations. *DRILLMXW specifies the maximum number of wells drilled simultaneously.

DRILLT.description: Priority List for Automatic Drilling of Wells (Optional)
DRILLT.long description: *DRILLQ selects the algorithm for automatic opening of wells or the specification of the order of automatic drilling of wells. *DRILLT specifies a time delay between successive well drilling operations. *DRILLMXW specifies the maximum number of wells drilled simultaneously.

DTMAX.long description: Specify the maximum and minimum allowed time-step sizes.

DTMIN.long description: Specify the maximum and minimum allowed time-step sizes.

DTOP.description: Depth to the Tops of Grid Blocks (Conditional)
DTOP.long description: *DTOP specifies depth to the centre of the top face of each grid block in the top layer of the grid.

DTRAPN.long description: Indicate interpolation set number along with the values of interpolating parameter.

DTRAPW.long description: Indicate interpolation set number along with the values of interpolating parameter.

DTWAUTO.long description: Provide first timestep size after a reference time or a significant well change.

DTWELL.long description: Provide first timestep size after a reference time or a significant well change.

DTYPE.long description: *DTYPE specifies domain numbers of individual blocks for parallel Jacobian building.

DUALPERM.long description: *DUALPERM enables the dual permeability option (dual porosity augmented with inter-block matrix flow).

DUALPOR.long description: *DUALPOR indicates the use of the dual porosity option.

DWOC.long description: Specify initial saturations in reservoir, or override vertical equilibrium saturations.

DYNAGRID.long description: Create or remove amalgamated grid cells and refinements statically, dynamically under simulator control or as a preconditioning step.

DYNAGRID-IGN-DIR.long description: Create or remove amalgamated grid cells and refinements statically, dynamically under simulator control or as a preconditioning step.

DYNAGRID-PICK-TYPE.long description: Create or remove amalgamated grid cells and refinements statically, dynamically under simulator control or as a preconditioning step.

DYNAGRID-TINT.long description: Create or remove amalgamated grid cells and refinements statically, dynamically under simulator control or as a preconditioning step.

DYNAGRID-TSINT.long description: Create or remove amalgamated grid cells and refinements statically, dynamically under simulator control or as a preconditioning step.

DYNAGRID-WLN-A.long description: Create or remove amalgamated grid cells and refinements statically, dynamically under simulator control or as a preconditioning step.

DYNAGRID-WLN-V.long description: Create or remove amalgamated grid cells and refinements statically, dynamically under simulator control or as a preconditioning step.

DYNGRDFREQ.long description: Control the frequency of dumping information flagged by *OUTSRF to the Simulation Results files.

EACT.long description: Assign thermal chemical reaction and nonequilibrium mass transfer data.

EACT_TAB.long description: Assign thermal chemical reaction and nonequilibrium mass transfer data.

ECOEF.long description: Define coefficients for a hyperelastic constitutive model #2 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

EHEATCYC.long description: Enable electrical heating and specify electrical property sets.

ELASTMOD.long description: Define strength properties of the formation.

ELASTMODI.long description: Define mechanical properties of an anisotropic rock.

ELASTMODJ.long description: Define mechanical properties of an anisotropic rock.

ELASTMODK.long description: Define mechanical properties of an anisotropic rock.

ELBOUND.long description: Specify electrical heating boundaries and operating conditions.

ELCONTAB.long description: Specify properties for each electrical heating set.

ELECHEAT.long description: Enable electrical heating and specify electrical property sets.

ELECTYPE.long description: Enable electrical heating and specify electrical property sets.

ELSCOMPTAB.long description: Specify properties for each electrical heating set.

ELTARGET.long description: Specify electrical heating boundaries and operating conditions.

ELTYPE.long description: Enable electrical heating and specify electrical property sets.

ELWCOMPTAB.long description: Specify properties for each electrical heating set.

END_TRIGGER.description: Allow for a Set of Keywords to be Processed When a Specified Condition (Trigger) is Satisfied (Optional)
END_TRIGGER.long description: Specify certain actions which are implemented when one or more specific conditions are satisfied during the simulation.

END-GRID.long description: *END-GRID flags the beginning of the data that defines the other reservoir properties.

ENDP_ADJUST.long description: Overwrite saturation endpoints, relative permeability endpoints and capillary pressure endpoints from the tables. Activate the three-point scaling and define how the saturation endpoints are applied.

EPCGO.long description: Specify third-phase correction for capillary pressure.

EPCOMPACT.long description: Define a reservoir compaction-rebounding model with elastic-plastic deformations via constant compressibility and thermal expansion coefficient.

EPCOW.long description: Specify third-phase correction for capillary pressure.

EPSCAL_IMEX.long description: Overwrite saturation endpoints, relative permeability endpoints and capillary pressure endpoints from the tables. Activate the three-point scaling and define how the saturation endpoints are applied.

EPSCUTOFF.long description: Use the Generalized Plasticty constitutive model which allows cohesion, friction angle and dilation angle to change with effective plastic strain.

EQUALSI.description: J and K Direction Data from I Direction
EQUALSI.long description: *EQUALSI indicates that values in the J and K directions are the same as those in the I direction, or that the values given for the I direction may be modified by division, multiplication, etc.

EQUILIBRATE.long description: *MODELSHUT allows fluid equilibration in a shut-in well via crossflow between layers.

EV.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

EXCHG-CAP.long description: Specify charge and names of sorbed species participating in the chemical reactions. Indicate the valence number difference for each species pair participating in exchange reactions with the reservoir clay. Input the ion-exchange capacity for the rock clays.

EXPCG.long description: Specify third-phase correction for capillary pressure.

EXPCW.long description: Specify third-phase correction for capillary pressure.

EXPN1.long description: Define coefficients for a hyperelastic constitutive model #2 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

EXPN2.long description: Define coefficients for a hyperelastic constitutive model #2 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

FAULT.long description: *FAULT indicates the input of designations for grid blocks whose flow connections are to take into account their exact position in the reservoir with respect to their lateral neighbours. Each *FAULT keyword is expected to describe a group of grid blocks that together form a geological fault block.

FAULTARRAY.long description: *FAULTARRAY signals the input of an array of binary flags which controls whether individual block faces are connected using standard connections or fault connections.

FCD-FRIC.long description: Use of flow control devices based on friction calculation through the FCD between tubing and annulus and/or annulus and reservoir, when all perforations have the same FCD and parameters; otherwise use *FCDL-PARAM.

FCD-FRIC-COEFF-PARAM.long description: Use of flow control devices based on friction calculation through the FCD between tubing and annulus and/or annulus and reservoir, when all perforations have the same FCD and parameters; otherwise use *FCDL-PARAM.

FCD-FRIC-GEOMETRY.long description: Use of flow control devices based on friction calculation through the FCD between tubing and annulus and/or annulus and reservoir, when all perforations have the same FCD and parameters; otherwise use *FCDL-PARAM.

FCDL.long description: Opens or closes flow control device (FCD) in a specified well and PERF location. These keywords may be used only with *FCDL-PARAM.

FCDL-PARAM.long description: Describes flow control device (FCD) in a specified well and PERF location.

FCD-ORIF.long description: Use flow control device (FCD) based on orifice flow between tubing and annulus and/or annulus and reservoir when all open perforations have the same FCD and parameters; otherwise, use the *FCDL-PARAM.

FCD-ORIF-DIAMETER.long description: Use flow control device (FCD) based on orifice flow between tubing and annulus and/or annulus and reservoir when all open perforations have the same FCD and parameters; otherwise, use the *FCDL-PARAM.

FCD-ORIF-DISCHARGE-COEFF.long description: Use flow control device (FCD) based on orifice flow between tubing and annulus and/or annulus and reservoir when all open perforations have the same FCD and parameters; otherwise, use the *FCDL-PARAM.

FCD-ORIF-DISCHARGE-COEFF-CNST.long description: Use flow control device (FCD) based on orifice flow between tubing and annulus and/or annulus and reservoir when all open perforations have the same FCD and parameters; otherwise, use the *FCDL-PARAM.

FCDTABLE.long description: Specify a flow control device via a table for use with *FCDL-PARAM *TABLE.

FGMRES.long description: *FGMRES selects the flexible variant of the Generalized Minimum Residual method (GMRES) acceleration for *PARASOL.

FI_ALIGN.long description: *FI_ALIGN is used to enable or disable fully implicit alignment.

FILENAME.long description: Specify names for input and output files. Needed only to override default file names, or specify input restart when not using command-line argument. The main data file must be specified via the standard input device (keyboard/job-running script) or the command-line argument "-f".

FILENAMES.long description: Specify names for input and output files. Needed only to override default file names, or specify input restart when not using command-line argument. The main data file must be specified via the standard input device (keyboard/job-running script) or the command-line argument "-f".

FLUX_ISECTOR.long description: Specify flux sectors via sector number and grid array.

FLUX_SECTORNAMES.long description: Specify flux sectors via sector number and grid array.

FLX_WELLBORE.long description: Calculate complex wellbore behavior which cannot be modeled by a Sink/Source well.

FLXB-ACTIVE.long description: Specify the active flux boundaries for the reduced run.

FLXB-DEF.long description: Specify flux boundaries via flux boundary names, numbers and assign to grid array.

FLXB-IN.long description: *FLXB-OUT specifies the name of flux boundary output file in the full-field run. *FLXB-IN specifies the name of flux boundary input file in the reduced run.

FLXB-NAMES.long description: Specify flux boundaries via flux boundary names, numbers and assign to grid array.

FLXB-OUT.long description: *FLXB-OUT specifies the name of flux boundary output file in the full-field run. *FLXB-IN specifies the name of flux boundary input file in the reduced run.

FLXB-TYPE.long description: Specify boundary condition type for the flux boundary file generated by the full-field run.

FLXPUMP.long description: *FLXPUMP adds a pump with specified power and maximum allowed pressure change for tubing strings or annulus of producer wells.

FONE.description: Compaction-Rebounding With Variable cp and cT (Optional)
FONE.long description: Define a pore volume compaction-rebounding model via the pressure history dependent pore compressibility and thermal expansion coefficient.

FORCE_MAXCHK.description: Normal Variation in Variables per Timestep (Optional)
FORCE_MAXCHK.long description: *NORM specifies target changes in the basic variables over a timestep. *MAX_OS_FACTOR allows the variable change to exceed *NORM without triggering timestep size cut. *FORCE_MAXCHK can be used to override the default strategy for maximum change check and timestep size cut.

FORCETOL.long description: Override default control parameters for plastic deformation option.

FORMINFRAC.long description: Assign the fracture block's volume fraction and the rock-in-fracture fraction.

FPVOLM.long description: Assign limits of pore volume and transmissibility changes due to volumetric dilation which includes the shear dilation component.

FR.long description: Define a reservoir pore volume dilation-recompaction model.

FRACANGLE.long description: Specify direction of fracture when the fracture permeability option *GPERMBB is used.

FRACTURE.long description: *FRACTURE is used immediately after a grid property keyword in a dual porosity system to indicate that a fracture property is being input.

FRANGSOFT.long description: Use the Generalized Plasticty constitutive model which allows cohesion, friction angle and dilation angle to change with effective plastic strain.

FRATIO.long description: Define coefficients for a hyperelastic constitutive model #2 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

FREQFAC.long description: Assign reaction data that is mandatory when reactions are used.

FREQFACP.long description: Assign reaction data that is mandatory when reactions are used.

FRFRAC.long description: Assign the fracture block's volume fraction and the rock-in-fracture fraction.

FRICANGLE.long description: Define strength properties of the formation.

FRICANGMAP.long description: Specify properties for each grid cell separately, when the degree of non-uniformity would cause the number of rock types to be inconvenient.

FRICANGMN.long description: Define coefficients for a hyperelastic constitutive model #2 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

FRICANGMX.long description: Define coefficients for a hyperelastic constitutive model #2 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

FRICHARDEN.long description: Use the Generalized Plasticty constitutive model which allows cohesion, friction angle and dilation angle to change with effective plastic strain.

FTWO.description: Compaction-Rebounding With Variable cp and cT (Optional)
FTWO.long description: Define a pore volume compaction-rebounding model via the pressure history dependent pore compressibility and thermal expansion coefficient.

FW-COUPLING.long description: Provide extra control for the accuracy of mole balance calculations between Flexible Wellbore and reservoir. The extra control is applied thorough a more rigorous procedure compared with the default mole balance check method.

FW-ITER.long description: Control the numerical behaviour of a Flexible Wellbore.

FW-MOBW-DENSITY.long description: *FW-MOBW-DENSITY controls the density of fluid flowing from a Flexible Wellbore to a reservoir block.

FW-RELAX-ACC.long description: Control the over-relaxation of accumulation terms in the Flexible Wellbore's Jacobian matrix.

FYOUNGAF.long description: Define coefficients for a hyperelastic constitutive model #2 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

FZ.long description: *FZ and *NFZ specify assignment of an input property to a type of fracture zone.

GAMMA.long description: Define coefficients for a nonlinear elastic constitutive model #1 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

GAPPOR.long description: Specify the method of apportioning a group target among contributing wells or subgroups. Currently *AUTODRILL is the only method supported.

GASLIQKV.long description: Assign K values in table form. Liquid-liquid K values must be assigned this way.

GASSYLIQ.long description: Assign gas-like properties to components in liquid phases.

GASSYSLD.long description: Assign properties of components in the solid/adsorbed/trapped phase.

GAUSSPNT.long description: Override default control parameters for plastic deformation option.

GBCPFACT.long description: Specify initiation and propagation of a hydraulic fracture in *GEOGRID. Information related to fracture is passed back to a reservoir simulator.

GBCUFACT.long description: Specify initiation and propagation of a hydraulic fracture in *GEOGRID. Information related to fracture is passed back to a reservoir simulator.

GCAPD.long description: Define coefficients for a cap model #1 as described in keyword *GCAPMODEL.

GCAPLOC.long description: Define coefficients for a cap model #1 as described in keyword *GCAPMODEL.

GCAPMAT.long description: Define coefficients for a cap model #1 as described in keyword *GCAPMODEL.

GCAPMOD.long description: Define coefficients for a cap model #1 as described in keyword *GCAPMODEL.

GCAPMODEL.long description: Using cap model for an elasto-plastic constitutive model.

GCAPR.long description: Define coefficients for a cap model #1 as described in keyword *GCAPMODEL.

GCAPTEN.long description: Define coefficients for a cap model #1 as described in keyword *GCAPMODEL.

GCAPW.long description: Define coefficients for a cap model #1 as described in keyword *GCAPMODEL.

GCINCRMT.long description: Define coefficients for a cap model #1 as described in keyword *GCAPMODEL.

GCIOFF.description: Flag for Specifying Groups or Wells under or not under Group Apportionment (Optional)
GCIOFF.long description: Specify whether particular groups or wells will or will not participate in the apportionment of higher-level group production or injection targets.

GCION.description: Flag for Specifying Groups or Wells under or not under Group Apportionment (Optional)
GCION.long description: Specify whether particular groups or wells will or will not participate in the apportionment of higher-level group production or injection targets.

GCON-AQUIFER.long description: Include total aquifer influx in group controls for maintaining field or sector pressure.

GCONCYCLE.description: Allow Group Cycling to be Turned On/Off (Optional)
GCONCYCLE.long description: Turn on or off group cycling control specified earlier with *GCONCYCLE_START.

GCONCYCLE_END.description: Allow a Cycling Group to be Defined (Optional)
GCONCYCLE_END.long description: Specify data for EOR/IOR processes which rely on alternating production and/or injection cycles. Generally multiple cycles are required and each cycle consists of a number of well-defined parts. Examples include water alternating gas injection (WAG) and cyclic steam injection. A number of criteria are available to control the duration of each cycle part.

GCONCYCLE_START.description: Allow a Cycling Group to be Defined (Optional)
GCONCYCLE_START.long description: Specify data for EOR/IOR processes which rely on alternating production and/or injection cycles. Generally multiple cycles are required and each cycle consists of a number of well-defined parts. Examples include water alternating gas injection (WAG) and cyclic steam injection. A number of criteria are available to control the duration of each cycle part.

GCONCYCR_END.description: Allow Cycling Group Data to be Revised (Optional)
GCONCYCR_END.long description: Revise data specified earlier in the simulation with *GCONCYCLE_START.

GCONCYCR_START.description: Allow Cycling Group Data to be Revised (Optional)
GCONCYCR_START.long description: Revise data specified earlier in the simulation with *GCONCYCLE_START.

GCONI.long description: *GCONI is used to specify group injection controls.

GCONIINCR.description: Group Injection Constraint Multipliers or Increments (Optional)
GCONIINCR.long description: Apply a multiplying factor or an increment to any previously specified group injection target.

GCONIMULT.description: Group Injection Constraint Multipliers or Increments (Optional)
GCONIMULT.long description: Apply a multiplying factor or an increment to any previously specified group injection target.

GCONM.long description: Specify monitored group production constraints that can trigger closing of wells and individual completion layers. Production targets are met by using one of the available apportionment methods specified by *APPOR-METHOD.

GCONP.long description: *GCONP is used to specify group production controls.

GCONPINCR.description: Group Production Constraint Multiplier or Increment (Optional)
GCONPINCR.long description: Apply a multiplying factor or an increment to any previously specified group production target.

GCONPMULT.description: Group Production Constraint Multiplier or Increment (Optional)
GCONPMULT.long description: Apply a multiplying factor or an increment to any previously specified group production target.

GCOORD.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GCORNERS.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GCOUPLING.long description: Control porosity and permeability coupling from deformation to fluid flow.

GCPOFF.description: Flag for Specifying Groups or Wells under or not under Group Apportionment (Optional)
GCPOFF.long description: Specify whether particular groups or wells will or will not participate in the apportionment of higher-level group production or injection targets.

GCPON.description: Flag for Specifying Groups or Wells under or not under Group Apportionment (Optional)
GCPON.long description: Specify whether particular groups or wells will or will not participate in the apportionment of higher-level group production or injection targets.

GCRITICAL.long description: Specify initiation and propagation of a hydraulic fracture in *GEOGRID. Information related to fracture is passed back to a reservoir simulator.

GCRV.long description: Indicate interpolation set number along with the values of interpolating parameter.

GCUPDATE.long description: Specify at what frequency or times that coupling updates are done.

GDI.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GDJ.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GDK.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GELEVATB.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GELEVATT.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GENPLAST.long description: Use the Generalized Plasticty constitutive model which allows cohesion, friction angle and dilation angle to change with effective plastic strain.

GEO_IMSET.long description: Specify use of explicit or implicit calls to geochem modules.

GEOCHEM.long description: Initiate geochemistry option for simulating aqueous reactions. Specify the number of elemental components and total number of fluid and solid species participating in the aqueous reactions. Indicate if precipitation and ion exchange is present and the total number of sorbed species. Also, indicate the geo-elements and their location in the STARS component list. Enter the reference temperature for geochemical reactions.

GEODEPTH.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GEODOMAIN.long description: Specify grid domains in which geomechanics calculations are performed.

GEOEXTD.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GEOGRID.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GEOMETRY.long description: *GEOMETRY specifies well geometric characteristics used for calculating well index internally.

GEOPOSTFREQ.long description: Run Geomechanics in STARS in post-processing mode.

GEOPOSTPRO.long description: Run Geomechanics in STARS in post-processing mode.

GEORBLOCK.long description: Specify the reference block for stress gradient option.

GEOSOLID.long description: Assign geomechanical properties for a STARS solid component.

GEXDI.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GEXDJ.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GEXDK.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GEXMAXI.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GEXMAXJ.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GEXMAXK.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GEXMINI.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GEXMINJ.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GEXMINK.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is extended from host simulator’s grid.

GEXPONENTN.long description: Define coefficients for a nonlinear elastic constitutive model #1 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

GFUELFRAC.description: Fuel Consumption Fraction for Group Gas Recycling (Optional)
GFUELFRAC.long description: Specify a maximum fraction of a group’s surface gas production available for consumption as fuel, which reduces the amount of gas available for re-injection.

GFUELMASK.description: Fuel Consumption or Sales Component Mask for Group Gas Recycling (Optional)
GFUELMASK.long description: *GFUELMASK or *GSALESMASK is used to specify component reduction factors for group gas consumed as fuel or diverted for sales, which reduces the amount of produced gas from a group available for reinjection by the same or another group. Gas recycling injection targets are specified for groups using the *GCONI keyword.

GFUELMAXR.description: Maximum Fuel Consumption Rate for Group Gas Recycling (Optional)
GFUELMAXR.long description: Specify a maximum rate at which the surface gas produced by a group is made available for consumption as fuel, which reduces the amount of gas available for re-injection.

GJRC.long description: Specify initiation and propagation of a hydraulic fracture in *GEOGRID. Information related to fracture is passed back to a reservoir simulator.

GKRIGING.long description: Enable Kriging method for calculating unknown initial stresses when only few sampling points are avaiable.

GLCONTROL.long description: Specify gas lift controls for a given set of production wells.

GLIFT.long description: Specify lift gas rate for production wells, or specify the method by which the lift gas rate is calculated.

GLOADBC.long description: Specify direction and magnitude of body forces on a per-plane basis.

GLOADBC3D.long description: Specify direction and magnitude of body forces on a per-plane basis in 3D.

GLOPT.long description: Specify an option to optimize oil production by automatic allocation of lift gas.

GMCREEP.long description: Assign a creep constitutive model for a type of rock. Creep is defined as the time-dependent strain that happens in a material at constant stress.

GMKCOMP.description: Make-up Composition for Group Gas or Water Recycling (Optional)
GMKCOMP.long description: *GMKCOMP or *WMKCOMP is used to specify the composition of gas/water injected as part of a group gas/water recycling target to supplement the recycled fluid.

GMKMAXR.description: Maximum Make-up Gas Rate for Group Gas Recycling (Optional)
GMKMAXR.long description: Specify the maximum surface rate of make-up gas injected as part of a group gas recycling target to supplement the recycled fluid.

GMKUPTO.description: Gas Make-up Target for Group Gas Recycling (Optional)
GMKUPTO.long description: Specify a target of surface gas injection rate for each listed well group. The variable recycled gas will be supplemented by make-up gas to meet each group’s target, subject to other well constraints.

GMONETONE.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GNULL.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GOC_PC.long description: Specify capillary pressures at the water-oil and gas-oil contacts.

GOUTSRF.long description: Enable independent graphics file (SR2) for geomechanics.

GPATM.long description: Define coefficients for a hyperelastic constitutive model #2 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

GPERMAX.long description: Specify initiation and propagation of a hydraulic fracture in *GEOGRID. Information related to fracture is passed back to a reservoir simulator.

GPERMCOEF.long description: Specify initiation and propagation of a hydraulic fracture in *GEOGRID. Information related to fracture is passed back to a reservoir simulator.

GPERMES.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMLC.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNEX.long description: Specify fracture-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNEX_MT.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNEY.long description: Specify fracture-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNEY_MT.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNEZ.long description: Specify fracture-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNEZ_MT.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNTX.long description: Specify fracture-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNTX_MT.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNTY.long description: Specify fracture-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNTY_MT.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNTZ.long description: Specify fracture-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMNTZ_MT.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMRES.long description: Specify initiation and propagation of a hydraulic fracture in *GEOGRID. Information related to fracture is passed back to a reservoir simulator.

GPERMTS.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPERMVL.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GPHYDDEP.description: Manifold Depth for Calculating Pressure Difference Between Manifold and Surface (Optional)
GPHYDDEP.long description: Specify the manifold depth, which scales the pressure drop linearly relative to the depth specified with the hydraulics table indicated by keyword *GPTABLE.

GPOLY.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GPRODGROUP.description: Gas Producing Group for Group Recycling/Voidage Replacement (Optional)
GPRODGROUP.long description: Specify the group from which gas production rates and composition will be taken to calculate a gas recycling injection target or a voidage replacement by gas target specified for another group or groups using the *GCONI keyword.

GPSCALING.long description: Control porosity and permeability coupling from deformation to fluid flow.

GPTABLE.description: Specification of Hydraulics Tables for Calculating Pressure Difference Between Manifold and Surface (Optional)
GPTABLE.long description: Specify the group pressure table (defined by *PTUBE1 or *ITUBE1) used to compute the pressure drop between manifold and surface.

GPTOLMUL.long description: Adjust pressure tolerance for computing porosity formulae given in keyword *GCOUPLING.

GRECYMASK.description: Recycled Component Mask for Group Gas or Water Recycling (Optional)
GRECYMASK.long description: *GRECYMASK or *WRECYMASK is used to specify component reduction factors for group re-injection of produced gas/water remaining after the gas/water treatment.

GRECYMAXR.description: Maximum Re-injection Rate for Group Gas Recycling (Optional)
GRECYMAXR.long description: Specify a maximum rate at which gas is re-injected under a group recycling target that was defined by keyword *GCONI.

GRGASTAB.long description: Specify formation geomechanical properties that depend on fluid saturation.

GRID.long description: *GRID defines the type of fundamental (main) grid and marks the beginning of the reservoir description.

GRMPRSTAB.long description: Specify formation geomechanical properties that depend on effective mean stress or minimum principal effective stress.

GROCKTAB.long description: Stress-dependent dilation-recompaction table lookup is used to determine permeability multipliers or transmissibility multipliers.

GROILTAB.long description: Specify formation geomechanical properties that depend on fluid saturation.

GROTATEI.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GROTATEJ.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GROTATEK.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GROUP.long description: *GROUP is used to identify gathering centres, groups and platforms. This keyword is useful for building a tree structure of groups.

GROUPALQ.long description: Specify the ALQ quantity in interpolations in a hydraulics table entered using the *PTUBE1 table format.

GRPORTAB.long description: Specify formation geomechanical properties that depend on porosity.

GRPRESTAB.long description: Specify formation geomechanical properties that depend on fluid pore pressure.

GRSTRESTAB.long description: Specify formation geomechanical properties that depend on effective mean stress or minimum principal effective stress.

GRTEMTAB.long description: Specify temperature dependence of geomechanical properties.

GRWATAB.long description: Specify formation geomechanical properties that depend on fluid saturation.

GSALESFRAC.description: Sales Rate Fraction for Group Gas Recycling (Optional)
GSALESFRAC.long description: Specify a maximum fraction of the surface gas produced by a group (less the amount consumed as fuel) that is available for sale, which reduces the amount of gas available for re-injection.

GSALESMASK.description: Fuel Consumption or Sales Component Mask for Group Gas Recycling (Optional)
GSALESMASK.long description: *GFUELMASK or *GSALESMASK is used to specify component reduction factors for group gas consumed as fuel or diverted for sales, which reduces the amount of produced gas from a group available for reinjection by the same or another group. Gas recycling injection targets are specified for groups using the *GCONI keyword.

GSALESMAXR.description: Maximum Sales Rate for Group Gas Recycling (Optional)
GSALESMAXR.long description: Specify a maximum rate at which the surface gas produced by a group is made available for sales, which reduces the amount of gas available for re-injection.

GTRANSLI.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GTRANSLJ.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GTRANSLK.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GUIDEI.description: Guide Rates for Groups or Wells
GUIDEI.long description: Specify guide rates to distribute the production or injection rates among groups or wells, to meet the production or injection target.

GUIDEP.description: Guide Rates for Groups or Wells
GUIDEP.long description: Specify guide rates to distribute the production or injection rates among groups or wells, to meet the production or injection target.

GULBULKMOD.long description: Define coefficients for a nonlinear elastic constitutive model #1 as described in the keyword *NLINEAR.

GULOGINT.long description: Specify matrix-block permeability multiplier depending upon geomechanical response.

GVISCOR.long description: Override the internal gas phase viscosity with a composition-dependent, and possibly pressure-dependent, calculation.

GXCORN.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GYCORN.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

GZCORN.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

HARDEN.long description: Define strength properties of the formation.

HEAD-METHOD.long description: *HEAD-METHOD is used to identify the head method to be used.

HEATER_CABLE.long description: Attach heater cable to tubing, to heat up the wellbore and near-well region.

HEATR.description: Constant and Convective Heat Transfer Model
HEATR.long description: Assign data for constant and convective heat transfer models.

HEATSLAVE.long description: Assign data for slaved heater control.

HF_IN_NULL.long description: Specify a template of data for the planar fracture model and apply it in multiple locations.

HFPROP.long description: Define aquifer model for reservoir boundary water influx and heat transfer calculations.

HINJW.long description: Assign and override defaults of attributes of the injected stream.

H-ION.long description: Specify the name and charge of the aqueous species participating in the chemical reactions.

HLOSSPROP.long description: *HLOSSPROP defines the heatloss directions and over/underburden thermal properties for the semi-analytical infinite-overburden heat loss model. *HLOSST and *HLOSSTDIFF control the overburden temperature and critical temperature difference.

HLOSST.long description: *HLOSSPROP defines the heatloss directions and over/underburden thermal properties for the semi-analytical infinite-overburden heat loss model. *HLOSST and *HLOSSTDIFF control the overburden temperature and critical temperature difference.

HLOSSTDIFF.long description: *HLOSSPROP defines the heatloss directions and over/underburden thermal properties for the semi-analytical infinite-overburden heat loss model. *HLOSST and *HLOSSTDIFF control the overburden temperature and critical temperature difference.

HTWELL.long description: Assign data for a heater well.

HVAPR.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

HVR.long description: Over-ride defaults for fluid heat capacities.

HYDROFRAC.long description: Specify initiation and propagation of a hydraulic fracture in *GEOGRID. Information related to fracture is passed back to a reservoir simulator.

HYDROGEN.long description: Indicate the location of the geo-element HYDROGEN in the STARS component list.

HYS_CFACTG.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_CFACTNW.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_DRAING.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_DRAING_2ND.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_DRAINW.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_HYS_DRAINW_2ND.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_IMBIBG.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_IMBIBW.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_KRG.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_KRO.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_KRW.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_LEVEL.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_PCOG.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_PCOW.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_REVG.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_REVW.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_TOLG.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_TOLW.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_TRAPG.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

HYS_TRAPNW.long description: These keywords enable the relative permeability and capillary pressure hysteresis option and signal entry of hysteresis parameters.

IDEALGAS.long description: Assign component critical pressure, critical temperature and acentric factor.

IFTTABLE.long description: Define interfacial tension and interpolation functions.

IJK.long description: *IJK assigns a constant value of a grid property within the region defined by the minimum and maximum block number in each of the three directions.

IJPJ.long description: A mass of jointed rock is treated as anisotropy, as opposed to the isotropy of an intact rock.

IKPJ.long description: A mass of jointed rock is treated as anisotropy, as opposed to the isotropy of an intact rock.

IN_PR_SHUT.long description: Specify conditions for switching between injection, injection - production soak, production and production - injection shut-in cycles for a Cyclic steam stimulation.

INCLUDE.long description: The *INCLUDE keyword indicates that reading of the primary input data set is suspended. Instead, a secondary file will be read.

INCOMP.long description: Specify one or more injected phases with compositions.

INCOMPWL.long description: *INCOMPWL sets the mole fractions of injected lift-gas for producers or injected streams for injectors.

INIT_FROM_IMEX.long description: Specify that initial conditions are to come from the SR2 files generated by an IMEX run.

INIT_FROM_RESTART.long description: Specify that initial conditions are to come from a restart record.

INITFANGLE.long description: Use the Generalized Plasticty constitutive model which allows cohesion, friction angle and dilation angle to change with effective plastic strain.

INITIAL.long description: *INITIAL indicates the beginning of initial condition values.

INJ_C_SWT.long description: Specify conditions for switching between injection, injection - production soak, production and production - injection shut-in cycles for a Cyclic steam stimulation.

INJECTOR.long description: Specify a well’s type (producer or injector).

INJ-TEMP.long description: *INJ-TEMP specifies the bottom-hole temperature of injected fluid in the wells.

INT.long description: *INT indicates that the corresponding table entry should be filled by interpolation.

INTERP_ENDS.long description: Specify the method for interpolation of saturation functions. Specify also how saturation endpoints are treated when interpolating between sets of curves as directed by keywords *KRINTRP and *RPT_INTRP.

INTERP_SCAL.long description: Specify the method for interpolation of saturation functions. Specify also how saturation endpoints are treated when interpolating between sets of curves as directed by keywords *KRINTRP and *RPT_INTRP.

INTERRUPT.long description: Specify the action taken when an interrupt signal is detected.

INTLIN.long description: Define interfacial tension and interpolation functions.

INTLOG.long description: Define interfacial tension and interpolation functions.

INTPOWER.long description: Use and specify geomechanics grid that is independent of the host simulator’s grid.

INUNIT.long description: *INUNIT specifies the input data units. *OUTUNIT specifies the output data units.

IONCOMP.long description: Specify the name of each of the STARS components being adsorbed that are associated with the geochemical sorbed species.

IONCOMP1.long description: Assign rock/clay ion-exchange parameters for STARS components.

IONCOMP2.long description: Assign rock/clay ion-exchange parameters for STARS components.

IONQV.long description: Assign rock/clay ion-exchange parameters for STARS components.

IONQVM.long description: Input the rock dependent ion-exchange capacity multiplier associated with the geochemical sorbed species.

IONXKC.long description: Assign rock/clay ion-exchange parameters for STARS components.

ISECTOR.long description: Specify reporting sectors to summarize regional reservoir activity, via sector number and grid array.

ISOTHERMAL.long description: Indicate formulation options of numerical model.

ITERMAX.long description: Specify the maximum allowed number of linear solver iterations.

ITERMAXG.long description: Control the AIMSOL/PARASOL/PCG matrix solver for the geomechanics equations.

ITUBE1.long description: *PTUBE1 or *ITUBE1 specifies a table of tubing-head (or outlet) pressure data tables for a production or injection well (or manifold group). The tabulated variable is the bottom-hole (or inlet) pressure, with tubing-head (or outlet) pressure and several independent variables such as surface rates or rate ratios. *PTUBE1 can also be used to input the well-head temperature table.

IVAR.description: Array Input of Values that Vary in the I Direction
IVAR.long description: *IVAR is used to indicate values that vary in the I direction, but which are constant in the other two directions.

JACDOMS.description: Parallel Jacobian Building from Solver Classes (Optional)

JDUMPG.long description: Control the AIMSOL/PARASOL/PCG matrix solver for the geomechanics equations.

JF_PCLIMIT.long description: Use Leverett J Functions to represent capillary effects.

JFUNC.long description: Use Leverett J Functions to represent capillary effects.

JKPJ.long description: A mass of jointed rock is treated as anisotropy, as opposed to the isotropy of an intact rock.

JVAR.description: Array Input of Values that Vary in the J Direction
JVAR.long description: *JVAR is used to indicate values that vary in the J direction, but which are constant in the other two directions.

K_SURF.long description: Specify reference conditions for fluid properties and surface conditions.

KAVMF.description: Direct Input of Shape Factor and Transfer Permeability Arrays (Optional)
KAVMF.long description: Keywords *SIGMAMF and *KAVMF allow direct input of the block shape factor and average transfer permeability arrays, respectively, for each grid block to be used in calculating matrix-fracture flow for the natural fracture grid options.

KDIR.long description: *KDIR specifies the orientation of the grid’s K direction relative to gravity.

KL_SURF.long description: Specify reference conditions for fluid properties and surface conditions.

KRGCW.long description: Overwrite saturation endpoints, relative permeability endpoints and capillary pressure endpoints from the tables. Activate the three-point scaling and define how the saturation endpoints are applied.

KRGIE.long description: Overwrite saturation endpoints, relative permeability endpoints and capillary pressure endpoints from the tables. Activate the three-point scaling and define how the saturation endpoints are applied.

KRINTRP.long description: Indicate interpolation set number along with the values of interpolating parameter.

KRNOPR.long description: Specify data and printout for automatic rock-fluid switching.
